sources.title: The Amazing Adventure 1936 Colorized
sources.description: Also known as The Amazing Quest of Ernest Bliss. From IMDB: A bored millionaire wagers his doctor that he can support himself at a working class job for year without touching his inheritance.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0027286/reference Public Domain movie. Colorized using neural AI (DeOldify technology). (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
